page.title: 06GODDINGTON PARK, ORPINGTON
page.content: {Goddington Park} is used for many activities. There are two playing areas in Goddington Park. It is used for {Fairs}, {Carnivals} and a {Donkey Derby}} every year. {Sport} is also played there. These are the main ones: {cricket}, {football} and sometimes {rugby}. There is a {May Queen procession} yearly for which a new Queen is chosen. There is also a {carnival} which is a mixture of {floats and majorettes}. This is held every year.The {fair} comes several times each year. There is a park in {Eldred Drive} too,which is mainly a playing area for younger children.
